message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $100 is too low for me. Would you consider $130?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it, but I still think we might be able to find a middle ground. Would $120 be within your range?
